description: From the trout stream to your best friend's casual wedding (hopefully with a quick wash in between), the Aerobora Short-Sleeve Shirt will keep the sun off your shoulders and the good times flowing from the river to cocktail hour. With a breathable quick-drying fabric, getting sweaty will be the least of your worries when you're looking to impress on date night or setting up camp in the summer heat. This short-sleeve button down will fool your most fashionable city-slicking friends with a lightweight durability and casual style that can hang at the crag, office, and drinks downtown.
name: Marmot Aerobora SS - Mens
